.tabs {
      position: relative;   
      min-height: 200px; /* This part sucks */
      clear: both;
      margin: 25px 0;
    }
    .tab {
      float: left;
    }
    .tab label {
      background: #eee; 
      padding: 10px; 
      border: 1px solid #ccc; 
      margin-left: -1px; 
      position: relative;
      left: 1px; 
    }
    .tab [type=radio] {
      display: none;   
    }
    .content {
      position: absolute;
      top: 28px;
      left: 0;
      background: white;
      right: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      padding: 20px;
      border: 1px solid #ccc; 
    }
    [type=radio]:checked ~ label {
      background: white;
      border-bottom: 1px solid white;
      z-index: 2;
    }
    [type=radio]:checked ~ label ~ .content {
      z-index: 1;
    }
